description: Narrowly re-elected, Poland's president staunchly defends Catholic family values.
title: Poland's Andrzej Duda rides wave of 'sacred tradition'
title_page: Poland's Andrzej Duda rides wave of 'sacred tradition' - BBC News
maintext: Many Polish families have been lifted out of poverty as a result of the government's policies, and, for the first time since the end of communism in 1989, feel there is a party that cares about their needs.
